channel.title: Character is stuck in Height=1 Character Files DO NOT WORK!
channel.description:
I really didn't want to make another thread but i know u probably wouldn't look at the other one again
My character is stuck in Height = 1
I tried changing it back to 0 in character files, but it still resets to 0 everytime i log back on
Do not tell me to change the character files or i will get really mad..

item.title: Character is stuck in Height=1 Character Files DO NOT WORK!
item.dc:creator: @verbios verbios
item.description:
@verbios wrote:

You can always try making a command which teleports whoever uses it to “height level = 0”.

The code might look like the following:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ground"))
{
	   teleportToX = absX;
           teleportToY = absY;
           heightLevel = 0;
	   sendMessage("You are now back on the ground! Horray!");
}

Read full topic
